title: Ranch Glazed Carrots
directions: Cook the carrots in 1 cup of boiling water until tender, about 5-6 minutes. Drain the carrots & place them back in the warm pot.
Add the butter, brown sugar & dry dressing mix to the carrots and toss to coat.
Mix until evenly combined and the carrots are well glazed. Serve warm (but still serves well chilled as leftovers)
ingredients: 1 envelope (1 ounce) dry ranch salad dressing & seasoning mix
